data.text: @norapinedo56 Hi there, how can we assist you? Kind regards, Ivana

@AndiR3x Hi Andreas, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten im Zuge deines Check-in hattest. Sollte der Prozess noch nicht erfolgreich abgeschlossen worden sein, sende uns bitte deinen Buchungscode in einer DM damit wir uns das ansehen können. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@joge_jonny Hallo Johannes, die Öffnungszeiten sind für diese Serviceline Montag - Freitag von 8:00 - 18:00. Hast du vielleicht außerhalb der Öffnungszeiten angerufen? 
Liebe Grüße, Sarah

@hereamllucas @AirCanada Hi Lucas, thank you for reaching out. We regret to hear that you have reason to complain. Please feel free to submit your complaint via the following link https://t.co/AwYcQtEU2C. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @martaclaramuntg Hi Marta, please send us your booking code and your request in a DM. Kind regards, Derya

@martaclaramuntg Dear Marta, it's 0800 000 231, Only accessible within Spain. OUTSIDE OUR BUSINESS HOURS please contact the Austrian Service number +43 1 70148 1000 for bookings and information in German and English. Kind regards, Ivana
@joge_jonny Lieber Johannes, welche Nummer hast du den versucht anzurufen? Liebe Grüße, Ivana

@tonightwefly7 Hallo, das kommt auf die Strecke und den Tarif an. Das können wir pauschal nicht beantworten. 
LG Sara

@jazztime1 Hi, vergessene Gegenstände werden vom Reinigungspersonal an den lokalen Flughafen übergeben. Leider können wir nicht behilflich sein, weil hier die Zuständigkeit nicht mehr bei der Airline liegt, wenn die Gegenstände übergeben werden. Wir bitten um Verständis.LG, Sarah
@joge_jonny @milesandmore_de Lieber Johannes, dann können wir dir leider nicht weiterhelfen. Das kannst du ausschließlich über die KollegInnen von Miles&More umbuchen. LG Sara
@joge_jonny @MilesandMore_DE Hallo Johannes, geht es um ein Meilenticket? LG Sara
@jazztime1 Hallo Johannes, wo genau hast denn deine Kopfhörer verloren? Liebe Grüße, Christiane
@tonightwefly7 Hallo, bitte schicke uns deinen Buchungscode, damit wir das prüfen können. Liebe Grüße, Sarah
@mbuerg Hallo Manfred, ich habe soeben auf deine DM geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@chrisdclegg Hi Christopher, if your ticket has been issued by a travel agency, only the agency is able to refund it. You'll have to contact your agency directly regarding your refund options. Unfortunately, we can't assist you further in this case. Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @meneervanboxem Hi, we received your inquiry but unfortunately we are not able to advise any certain time frame since we received a lot of requests lately. Our colleagues will do their best to get back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards,Christine

@angeljanevski Hi, we are truly sorry about your luggage. Did you write already an email to baggage.competence.center@austrian.com ?
Kind regards, Sarah
@arleneharris11 @lufthansa Hi Arlene, I am sorry that you are facing difficulties with the online check-in. Is there something we can assist you with? Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @ManuelaDeut Hallo Manuela, ich habe dir bereits auf deine Email geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@LiterallySmash Hi Sam, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Due to the enormous amount of requests we receive at the moment, there can, unfortunately, be longer waiting times. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@redalliance2 Hi, bitte wende dich hier direkt an unsere Kollegen charter.myholiday@austrian.com. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@flysoplane Hi, thank you for sharing your positive experience with us! ;) We hope to welcome you soon again on one of our flights. 
Kind regards, Sarah

@WoehrerA @Lufthansa_DE Hi Alexander, es tut uns sehr leid, dass du Grund zur Beschwerde hattest. Ich entschuldige mich aufrichtig für die Unannehmlichkeiten die dadurch entstanden sind. Können wir dir mit deiner Buchung behilflich sein? Liebe Grüße, Derya

data.text: @meelissxa Wir stehen einfach auf rot ;-) Liebe Grüße, Derya
@JSarajevo Hi Jazzy, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/FU3WnVuGti Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @JSarajevo Hi Jazzy, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Could you reach someone in the meantime? Kind regards, Christine

@JSarajevo Hi Jazzy, here is the contact number of our Customer Service Center in the US: +1 800843 0002
Kind regards, Sarah
@Mindreplacer Hi, we just replied to your DM. Kind regards, Sara
@dashchitalu Hi, please be so kind and send your request to baggage.competence.center@austrian.com. Our colleagues will assist you! Kind regards, Karin

@MarkSBaigent [5/5] Beim Online-Check-in oder am Check-in-Automaten muss der Passagier bestätigen, dass alle Einreisebestimmungen erfüllt sind. Wenn der Passagier beim Check-in Gepäck aufgibt, werden vom Bodenpersonal Corona-relevante Dokumente abgefragt. LG Karin

@MarkSBaigent [4/5] Reiseantritt stets über die aktuellen Reise- und Einreisebeschränkungen des Ziellandes und möglicher Transitpunkte zu informieren, da sich diese kurzfristig ändern können. Die Kontrolle von Corona-relevanten Dokumenten hängt somit vom jeweiligen Zielort ab.

@MarkSBaigent [3/5] Einreisebeschränkungen des Ziellandes und möglicher Transitpunkte zu informieren, da sich diese kurzfristig ändern können.nicht auf ein ausstehendes Testergebnis warten und nicht positiv getestet wurden. Alle Passagiere werden zudem gebeten, sich vor dem geplanten

@MarkSBaigent [2/5] Welche Dokumente erforderlich sind, wird daher nicht von der Fluggesellschaft festgelegt. Dennoch bitten wir alle Passagiere beim Check-in zu bestätigen, dass sie in den letzten 14 Tagen keinen Kontakt zu einem Covid-19-Fall hatten, aktuellen Reise- und

@MarkSBaigent Hi, [1/5] Grundsätzlich ist Austrian Airlines als Fluggesellschaft nicht dazu verpflichtet, Corona-bedingte Nachweise zu verlangen, um eine Reise anzutreten. Abhängig vom Ziel- bzw. Transitland kann es jedoch zu länderspezifischen Einreisebestimmungen kommen.
@JulioCotta @flughafen_wien Dear Julio, please send us the reference number of your inquiry in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara
@KennethYoun Hi Kenneth, if there's anything we can assist you with, please send us a DM. Kind regards, Ivana
@olivokarens Hi there, please check out the following link https://t.co/CKR6t7uMBt which batteries are allowed on board. Kind regards, Ivana

Back in #Canada!🇨🇦 
On 1 October we will add #Montreal to our long-haul destinations again. In cooperation with @AirCanada, we will fly our passengers three times a week year-round to the largest French-speaking city in North America!✈️

👉https://t.co/EHRyhLFLqb

#ServusMontreal https://t.co/ll8Qm3OF27

@vinewood666 Hi, you will receive the buggy at your end destination. Kind regards, Karin

data.text: @iashisjaiswal Hi, please be so kind and contact the official authorities regarding your request. Kind regards, Karin
@vinewood666 Hi there, you can take your buggy with you to the entrance before you board the plane, you cannot bring it on board. Kind regards, Ivana
@JplusGK Dear Jalil, please send your inquiry to specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Ivana
@vinewood666 Hi Toby, for children under two years of age, you may carry a foldable pram weighing a maximum of 10 kg free of charge. Best regards, Christiane
@jplusgk Hi Jalil, thank you for reaching out. How can we assist you? Kind regards, Derya

From 15 September 2021, the wearing of FFP2-masks without a valve has become mandatory on all Austrian Airlines flights. Therefore, please make sure to bring your own FFP2-mask with you. 

Find further information here: https://t.co/elIKPrrIjD 

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #WeCare https://t.co/L93IjRen8E
@Adam_Allcroft Hi Adam, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@mccoy_jan Hi Jan, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/tLH4nGMTae Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @simonmc Dear Simon, to bring your complaints to notice we kindly ask you to fill out our online form on https://t.co/b0RCkhgTVX. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@aubaneyang Hi there, we regret to hear that your luggage did not arrive. Did you contact the lost&found counter for an update?
Kind regards, Sara

@simonmc Hi Simon, we apologize for any inconvenience caused and hope that your future travels will be according to plan again. 
Kind regards, Sarah
@MELODYDARVISH Hi Melody, please fill out the contact form https://t.co/IrxO7x0wsv. Your request will be directed to the respective department. Kind regards, Derya
@tjmensink Hi Thomas, please send us the booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@tjmensink Hi Thomas, according to our information, your whole group has already been rebooked from our staff at Dubrovnik airport. Please contact our colleagues for further information or you check reservation online on our webpage https://t.co/D0B55USJbx. Best regards, Christiane
@sally1233363042 Hi sally1234, usually you will receive a receipt for your baggage automatically. Did you checked your baggage at the counter or at the baggage kiosk? Kind regards, Christine
@LedionShkembi @Orbitz Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @mayank_konoha [2/2] Via the following link: https://t.co/EO8eihJlrx you'll find all information and contact details. Please be informed that all passengers have to inform themselves about the individual country regulations.  Kind regards, Christine

@mayank_konoha [1/2] Hi, Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. Please contact the respective Austrian authorities regarding the current transit regulations.

@drljbarnes Hi Lawrence, please mind that in case your flight was not cancelled by the airline we can only refund according to the booked fare conditions.We are sorry that we have no better news for you. Kind regards, Christine
@The_OllO Hi, the booking is on hold and he can tell us the new travel dates until October 31st. You will not receive any confirmation here. He just needs to contact us on time. Best regards, Karin

Kind regards, Sarah

@fluglehrer Guten Morgen @fluglehrer, laut unserer internen Umfrage sind rund 90% unserer Kolleg:innen geimpft. Zudem gilt für alle Kolleg:innen an Bord die 3G-Regel. Wenn also Kolleg:innen nicht geimpft oder genesen sind, sind sie regelmäßig getestet.
@fluglehrer  Hi, wie bereits erwähnt gibt es in Österreich keine Impfplicht. Liebe Grüße, Susi

Committed to responsibility to bring people closer together, by not only taking them in the air but far beyond. We open your world, together as @lufthansa, @_austrian, @flyswiss, @flyingbrussels, @eurowings and @Lufthansa_Cargo. 

#WeareLufthansaGroup #WeAreAustrian #Servus https://t.co/lZIHnl2kDG

data.text: @TomSe_74 Hi Tom, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten mit der Dokumentenprüfung hattest. Leider können wir diese hier nicht veranlassen und können dich nur bitten, sollte der Prozess nicht funktionieren, direkt unsere Schalter am Flughafen, zu kontaktieren. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

data.text: @julianbrandl [3/3] angeboten. Liebe Grüße, Ivana

@julianbrandl [2/3] zu diesen beliebten Feriendestinationen zwischen den Buchungskategorien Economy und Business Class wählen. Wie auf allen Austrian-Kontinentalflügen unter drei Stunden werden Economy Class Kund:innen in Zukunft auch auf diesen Strecken die Produkte der Austrian Melangerie

@julianbrandl [1/3] Lieber Julian, Durch die Umstellung ist eine engere Verzahnung mit dem Rest des Austrian Streckennetzes möglich. Für die neu als Linienflüge angebotenen Strecken gelten alle Kundenvorteile des Austrian Airlines Linienangebots. So können Fluggäste nun auch zu diesen
@frafu Hi, hast du es auch ohne dem "Slash" probiert? Liebe Grüße, Derya
@meneervanboxem Hi Jeroen, 2 hours before departure you'll be able to drop your bags. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text:
The new destinations now bookable on https://t.co/Ot0LJCyXPb include Antalya, Catania, Ibiza, Palma de Mallorca, Keflavík, Mykonos as well as Málaga and Naples.

#Servus #AustrianAirlines

Next summer, Austrian Airlines will offer more scheduled flights to holiday destinations!☀️ 
Besides a better integration with the rest of the route network, travelers will benefit from all services available on scheduled flights. https://t.co/AtjyazOOQD
@MELODYDARVISH Hi Melody, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris

What an exciting day! 🛫😎 Yesterday, our last #Tokyo2020-flight for the Austrian Paralympic Committee touched down in Vienna. We congratulate all Austrian athletes on their fantastic performance at the #ParalympicGames. 👏 🇦🇹

#Servus #Paralympics2020 https://t.co/KBLj2mV2B9

entity.description: Tokyo 2020 will unveil the design of their Olympic medals at a One Year to Go Ceremony at the Tokyo International Forum.

data.text: @JulioCotta @flughafen_wien Hi, recently we experience a higher amount of requests, this may result in longer waiting times. We are sorry for that. Kind regards, Christine
@Britzstock Hi, please be so kind and contact the official authorities regarding your request. Best regards, Karin
@flagge_ Hi there, thank you for reaching out. You will find information about international entry restrictions here https://t.co/RFJnevodgv or https://t.co/qF14GdXBgT. Kind regards, Derya

@Chris2002x Hallo Christian, dein Gepäck wird nur bis Wien eingecheckt werden. Bitte hole es am Gepäcksband ab. Jedoch ist es auf dem Rückweg anders. Bitte schicke uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. Wir sehen gerne nach ob dein Ticket umbucbar ist. Liebe Grüße, Derya
@Sandywboyles Hi Sandy, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Sara
@AnnaBradford4 Hi Anna, kindly contact our colleagues directly at airport in order to receive any further information.Kind regards, Christine
@andreasggeo Hi Andreas, can we assist you somehow, please send us a DM? Kind regards, Christine
@mm_jewell  Hi, please send us your booking reference or your ticket number so that we can have a closer look. Best regards, Susi

@carolinetroy @sammijoanne  Hi Caroline, we’re sorry to hear your flight was delayed. If you wish to make a claim for expenses, you can do so by using the following link:  https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9. Best regards, Susi

data.text: @Michovska1 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. I am really sorry that your journey was accompanied by inconvenient circumstances. Please send us your booking code and your query in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@Sammijoanne Dear Sammi, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused. If there's anything we can assist you with, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
@jannikmeissner Hi Jannik, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
